Welcome to the National Youth Leadership Expedition 2025! 🙌
Volunteer Force Pakistan proudly announces Pakistan’s biggest outdoor leadership conference, returning this year with unmatched energy, vision, and impact!

Past Expeditions:
After the incredible success of past expeditions in Naran, Swat, Margalla Hills, and Shangla, we now invite you to the majestic Siran Valley for a transformative 3-day journey that blends adventure, leadership, and tourism like never before.

Event Overview:
🗓️ Date: 13th - 15th August
📍 Venue: Siran Valley, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa

Selected participants will embark on a high-impact leadership expedition designed to equip Pakistan’s future leaders with critical business, social, and life skills.

Activities include:
• Interactive training sessions
• Guided hikes
• Team challenges
• A vibrant cultural night under the stars

Tour & Training Highlights:
• 3-day outdoor adventure in the scenic mountains of Siran Valley
• Leadership games and workshops
• Cultural Night with music, talent, and storytelling
• Bonfire, guided hiking, and nature challenges
• Mentorship from experts and real-world success stories

Package Details:
💰 1. Students: PKR 16,000 per person
💰 2. Professionals: PKR 20,000 per person
For the first 30 participants only!

What’s Included?
• Comfortable transport from Islamabad to Siran Valley and back
• Full meals throughout the expedition
• Accommodation in shared rooms
• Hiking, outdoor games, leadership training, bonfire, and cultural night
• Expert-led sessions and success stories
• Official Leopardship Participation Certificate
